content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (17.5, 20.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (17.5, 20.5)
- Boiler at position (1.5, 23.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting various positions including (3.5, 17.5) and (-9.5, 23.5)
- Electricity Group with poles at positions such as (27.5, 26.5), (1.5, 6.5), (7.5, 8.5), (14.5, 20.5), (10.5, 13.5), and (21.5, 27.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors related to fuel and fluid connections
- Ensure that boilers are refueled promptly to avoid "out of fuel" warnings.
- Check that steam engines are properly connected to fluid sources to prevent "no input liquid" and "no fluid present in connections" warnings.
